data.name: Simple Discord contrast
data.description:
Removes unnecessary transparency.
Sets the text colour to white on dark theme, and to black on light theme.
Sets the fonts to system fonts that can render better.
Might slightly increase performance on low end devices.

DeepDark ANSI: Turquoise
data.description: Dark theme for animesub.info forum and wish list. Best looking with native theme "Zielona". DeepDark ANSI comes with 6 color variations: Blacklight, Blue, Green, Orange, Red and Turquoise.
